GPUTextureDepthOrArrayLayers.summary:
The depthOrArrayLayers read-only property of the
interface represents the depth or layer count of the GPUTexture.

remarks.para: This is set based on the size property in the descriptor object passed into the originating call.

GPUTextureDepthOrArrayLayers.value: A number. This represents:In cases where the GPUTexture does not have a depth or layers, the value is 1.
